summary: A Lunari save game file to show off and share the beauty of the wonderful race that is Lunari.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][color=yellow]UPDATE:[/color][/font] 

[b][color=yellow]Aug 13, 2012
Well well over 100 downloads in about a day. First, I really appreciate all of you, thanks a lot! Also I couldn\'t have even created Kariin without bhaktisean\'s Lunari Race mod.

Secondly, if she continues to get even more popular with the community then I will begin working to make her a companion for you guys! I already have the basics down, just need some \'motivation\' from you all to get her finished

Thank you all again! Keep coming back here for updates/news on this. Comment, post your own images, and endorse if you like.
/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
Aug 16, 2012
Kariin Ayame The Assassin From The East is almost ready to accompany you on your adventures through Skyrim! Currently adding final touches and file checks.
/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / 
Aug 18, 2012
Shes finally ready! The Assassin from the east is ready to join you on you adventures through Skyrim! Recruit [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22579]Kunoichi Ayame[/url][/color][/b]


A Lunari save game file to show off and share the beauty of the wonderful race that is Lunari.

I noticed that there aren\'t barely any Lunari saved game files on the Nexus yet there are over 50,000 people who have downloaded the Lunari Race mod by bhaktisean.(which is a lot don\'t get me wrong, and congratulations) The beauty of this race and possible outcomes in character creation can be absolutely stunning, and I\'d love to see them all.

So I thought maybe I\'d get the ball rolling a little faster than it is by sharing with you all the sexy deadly assassin Kariin. I hope you all like her, comment, and enjoy! d=^D

 [img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1301-51-18-00.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1301-32-44-05.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1302-03-16-01.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1302-03-31-58.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1301-56-12-70.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/SKYRIM/TESV2012-08-1301-55-55-69.jpg[/img]

To install: Open Saves folder found in Skyrim folder,(default location C:\\Users\\EvaNix\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim) extract the Kariin save file into the saves folder, launch Skyrim, load Kariin enjoy!

Mods Required:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602]Lunari RaceForUNP mod[/url] by bhaktisean

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii

Optional mods/Mods used in screenshots:

1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting[/url] by JJC71

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/866]ReAL Sun - insane0h Realistic Sunglare[/url] by sval

3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781]Project ENB[/url] by Bronze316

4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16919]Project Parallax - Whiterun[/url] by Osmodius

5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One[/url] by MannyGT

6. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8058#content]Open Cities Skyrim[/url] by Arthmoor

7. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM[/url] by Brumbek

CREDITS:
